description:
These events don't yet exist. Please see http://wiki.openstack.org/SystemUsageData for more details

Additional data needed to match spec includes add_ip and delete_ip, and bandwidth info.
Also, additional compute.instance.exists audit event should be generated before instance delete, to capture instance usage for final audit period.
title: Usage spec requires more data.

comments.content: These events don't yet exist. Please see http://wiki.openstack.org/SystemUsageData for more details

commit 5aa522908264b5ef97387821e18c13ad9a9b95a1
Author: Monsyne Dragon <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Sep 30 00:39:46 2011 +0000

    Adds more usage data to Nova's usage notifications.
    
    Adds in bandwidth, state and IP data on standard notifications,
    and new notifications on add/remove IP.
    
    These were missing before, and are needed to meet spec.
    This fixes bug 849117
    
    Change-Id: Ie586ff3a91a56e5f5eff8abc6905ba6a0b624451
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~openstack-gerrit
